$ZIM Zim is paying a $6.40 dividend April 4th (the stock is at $24 now). If you live in the USA
created_at: Israel withholder 25% as tax withholding. To some extent you can get this back as a tax credit when completing your USA income taxes but the process is convoluted and it is fairly likely you will not get credit for all of the taxes withheld (it depends on your situation
column3: one factor seems to be if you pay over 25% tax rate for all your income maybe you will get it all back - it is complicated so maybe not...).

Some details are here
